SEARCH

Package geometry

package geometry
This package contains classes that represent geometric shapes.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    geometry.formula
    This package contains the classes that represent the formulas used in the geometry calculations.
    geometry.trig
    This package contains classes that represent trigonometric functions.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Coordinate
    Coordinate class represents a point in 2D space.
    Distance
    Distance class contains static methods to calculate the distance between two points in 2D space.
    Polygon
    Represents a polygon with a given number of sides and side length.
    Shape
    Shape class represents a shape in 2D space.
    ThreeDimCoordinate
    A class to represent a 3D coordinate.
    ThreeDimShape
    ThreeDimShape class represents a shape in 3D space.
